name: SHGC
description:
SHGC is a weird tale vignette. It has never been finished and will probably remain a prototype for the foreseeable future. The games restricted camera angles were heavily inspired by RE: Code Veronica at the time.

Move your legs with WASD and your arms with LMB and the mouse. Click RMB to change color while holding a brush.

When you decided it's time to do a little painting in your apartment, not everything goes as expected....
